___dataif.description: Network interface to use for Data traffic.  Specify using the -d option.

___kvdb.description: Key Value database to use for PX to store configuration parameters.

___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each Marathon task.

___instances.description: Number of PX instances to run.

___storage.description: Local storage devices to use.  Specify devices using the -s option.  Multiple devices can be specified using multiple -s options.  To use all available devices, just use -a

___framework-name.description: The name of the framework. Until this is configurable, please do not change this from it's default value.

___mgmtif.description: Network interface to use for Mgmt traffic.  Specify using the -m option.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Marathon instance.
